---
name: Repo Core Rules
description: Always-on repo rules for correctness, verification, and maintainability.
applyTo: "**"
---

## Core rules

- Small diffs; separate refactors from behaviour changes.
- Include verification steps for non-trivial changes.
- Ask for requirements when ambiguous; do not guess.
- Avoid churn and unnecessary reformatting.

## Output format for change proposals

- Intent
- Scope boundaries
- Proposed changes (bullets)
- Verification commands
- Docs impact
